run(use_mpi=False, omp_max_threads=0, mpi_num_procs=1)[source]¶

Execute the binary and return a reference to the subprocess created

Parameters:
  • wait – If true the process waits until the command is completed
  • omp_num_threads – Number of OpenMP threads to be created by default the environment variable OMP_NUM_THREADS is not changed
  • mpi_num_procs – Number of MPI processes
Returns:
